if time permitting...
- GF#15823 Need+a+way+to+distinguish+solicited+and+unsolicited+observations (Lloyd McKenzie) Not Persuasive with Mod
- GF#14677 Category+for+core-characteristics+such+as+pregnancy+status. (Danielle Friend) Persuasive with Mod
- GF#11963 Consistency+in+DiagnosticReport+and+Observation+Category+-+2016-09+daf+%2350 (Hans Buitendijk) Not Persuasive

Re GF#17424 Specimen.subject+must+be+optional (Lloyd McKenzie) Not Persuasive - ====PULL=======

I am agreeing with @Lloyd McKenzie after a very long discussion and should be persuasive. There are backend use cases within systems where they may not need a subject - only the Specimen ID.
Also nice to have these two DR trackers discussed with the proposed resolutions:
• GF#17244 DiagnosticReport: change codedDiagnosis to diagnosis[x] Medium Rick Geimer Not Persuasive with Mod
• GF#16681 Make DiagnosticReport the finding placeholder - 2018-May Core STU #1 Medium Not Persuasive with Mod
GF#17542 change all OO extensions to camelCase has been preapplied and can be viewed in the latest CI Build.
